title: Tom Brady (rugby union)
text:
Thomas Brady (born 10 February 1991) is a retired professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who last played for the <a href="Leicester%20Tigers%20">Leicester Tigers </a>in <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Premiership Rugby</a>. Previously <a href="Sale%20Sharks">Sale Sharks</a> in Premiership Rugby. He plays on the <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a>. He currently plays in <a href="National%20League%201">National League 1</a> for <a href="Sale%20FC%20Rugby%20Club">Sale FC</a>.
On 29 February 2016 it was announced he had signed for Leicester Tigers for the 2016/17 season. He made his starting debut against his old side <a href="Sale%20Sharks">Sale</a> in Salford and made his first start at <a href="Welford%20Road%20Stadium">Welford Road</a> against <a href="Worcester%20Warriors">Worcester</a> on 8 October 2016 where he also scored his first try for the club. Tom scored the winning try vs <a href="Exeter%20Chiefs">Exeter Chiefs</a> in the Anglo Welsh Cup Final at <a href="The%20Stoop">The Stoop</a> in his first season with the club.
